name: Endless Path (Binus Game Development Club, Revay, kinako manjuu, Kenshia, Winson Allan Wijaya, Wilson Nathaniel, Youma)
name_original: Endless Path (Binus Game Development Club, Revay, kinako manjuu, Kenshia, Winson Allan Wijaya, Wilson Nathaniel, Youma)
description:
A lonely samurai slowly reaches his way to absolute strength as he keeps reliving the day he kills his ultimate foe.

Controls: 

  • AD to Move 
  • W to Jump 
  • Click to Attack

Mechanic: 

There will be 2 types of enemies: Beasts and Boss. You can revive up to three times.
For each death by beasts or boss, you gain a temporary stat boost. For each boss kill, all enemies gain a permanent stat boost. 
For each death you do not revive, you gain a permanent stat boost.  
All temporary stat boosts will be gone once the boss is killed.

Well then, good luck on your journey, dear Samurai. May you be blessed with a great adventure!

Credits
